FuncDef: This command specifies the type of RIP messages sent to RIP neighbors. This control can be issued at the global, group or interface level. The default behavior sends RIPv2 messages with the multicast (224.0.0.9) destination address.
CLIs: send { broadcast | multicast | none | version-1 | both }

ParaDef.Info: Send RIPv2 formatted messages to the broadcast address.
Send RIPv2 formatted messages to the multicast address.
Do not send any RIP messages (i.e. silent listener).
Send RIPv1 formatted messages to the broadcast address.
Send both RIP v1 & RIP v2 updates to the broadcast address.
